name: Sleepwalker (itch) (Sheinxy - Raphaël)
description:
Controls:

  • Left click on character: Jump (There’s a double jump)
  • Right click on character: Move/Stop
  • F: Switch camera mode
  • E: Re-center camera (in free camera mode)
  • WASD/ZQSD/Up Left Down Right: Move camera (in free camera mode)
  • Left click on moving platform: Move to next position
  • Right click on moving platform: Move to previous position
  • Left click on button to press it

Spikes kill
